data.text: @WebMD I and my husband managed to dodge getting COVID19 and both of us, with underlying health issues were vaccinated as soon as we could. We have also each had a booster. So far, neither of us has gotten COVID19. I hope we may benefit from another booster.
@WebMD Why don’t you give the information on “deep” records of complications from the COVID vaccine?

@WebMD @OracleofWallSt Be careful interpreting this data. The study comprised of older white veterans with multiple risk factors - diabetes, hypertension, smoking etc. The drastic reduction in medical services during the first few months of the pandemic may have impacted development of cardiac events.

@WebMD even ones who got the vaccine including my self: I still have heart ache and trouble breathing at night. that was clear to me after I got the second dose & i'm not intending to take the 3rd. many of people that I know have the same issue. ❤️‍🩹🦠
@WebMD Yeah the jab has NO CORRELATION ... wink wink
